{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Spooky Plate |image = [[File:Spooky_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Spooky Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Ghost}} }} ==Description== The '''Spooky Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Spooky Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Ghost Gems]] {{Gem|Ghost}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Spooky Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Lost Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Tin Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt. Pyre|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Old Chateau|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sendoff Spring|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Celestial Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hau'oli Cemetery|Epic}} {{LootItem|Memorial Hill|Epic}} {{LootItem|Malie Garden|Epic}} {{LootItem|Thrifty Megamart|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lake of the Sunne and Moone|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
